name: the great nothing
description:
disclaimer: this game contains rapidly strobing images so if you are suffering from epilepsy, i highly recommend you not to play it

unravel the story behind a ██████ community, that terrorised the countrymen around since 19██

there is nothing to worry about
step inside

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Shift - Run (alerts the ghost)
E - Interact
Right Mouse Button - Ghost Vision
Allows you to see the level from the perspective of the ghost
F11 - Fullscreen

Credits:
